alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Eastern Glacier; Hill; Liberty; Toole (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued December 31 at 1:31PM MST until December 31 at 5:00PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 11 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 30 below zero. * WHERE...Blaine, Eastern Glacier, Hill, Liberty and Toole Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 5 PM this afternoon to 11 AM MST Saturday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Eastern Glacier; Hill; Liberty; Toole
